text: Amazingly easy for people to dive into coding
Carmel is a new way of revolutionizing education, in a decentralized manner. Now we will see each different engagement getting incentivized, in a way that benefits the whole community.

The best way to empower any human is to give them relevant skills for the modern world. Carmel goes a step further to create the necessary incentives for those with these skills to pass them on to the ones who also need them. I believe the impact that Carmel will have will be profound in an age of fast evolving technology. The community approach supports a self sustaining ecosystem that gets all participants performing at their best. Creating what we like to losely call a communiversity.
description: Co-founder and Community lead EOS Nairobi
